Description: Big axe head made of greenish-grey stone, rounded trapezoidal in shape, tapered towards the butt, convex blade end. Front and back sides are roughly smoothed. The blade end is very well smoothed and shows a sharp edge. The section is slightly curved, getting thinner towards the blade end. The butt end is flattened.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
